holidays.title: National Love Your Red Hair Day
holidays.description: If you are gifted with the world’s rarest hair color this is the day to celebrate!

holidays.title: National Redhead Day
holidays.description: It’s every redhead’s chance to shine with each gorgeous strand of their hair.

holidays.title: Bonfire Night
holidays.description: Bonfire Night, or Guy Fawkes Day, ignites the historical failed attempt to blow-up the Parliament.

holidays.title: Colón Day in Panama
holidays.description: Colón Day is a time to commemorate freedom and independence with the people of Panama.

holidays.title: Election Day
holidays.description: Democracy is ideal; election is at its core, and therefore deserves to be celebrated.

holidays.title: Gunpowder Day
holidays.description: Wondering how to best observe Gunpowder Day? We have some great ideas brewing.

holidays.title: Guy Fawke's Night
holidays.description: Anarchist hero or traitor? Discover multiple facets to the legend of Guy Fawkes.

holidays.title: Melbourne Cup Day
holidays.description: "Cup Day," as it's popularly known, is the biggest horse racing event in Australia.

holidays.title: National Chinese Takeout Day
holidays.description: Learn more about National Chinese Takeout Day right here with us at National Today!

holidays.title: World Tsunami Awareness Day
holidays.description: Be prepared to learn important and relevant information about tsunamis. It may save your life.

holidays.title: Alexa Chung’s Birthday
holidays.description: Alexa Chung is beyond creative and she's an inspiration to so many around the world.

holidays.title: AllStar’s Birthday
holidays.description: Innovation and creativity are the driving forces for AllStar, our very own unique YouTube star.

holidays.title: Azlia Williams’s Birthday
holidays.description: A committed and focused personality, like Azlia Williams, is an inspiration for many.

holidays.title: BoA’s Birthday
holidays.description: Marvel at the multilingualism of the Queen of K-pop; enjoy her songs in three different languages.

holidays.title: Bryan Adams’s Birthday
holidays.description: Once a star, always a star, and few shine brighther than Bryan Adams.

holidays.title: Daisy Dares You’s Birthday
holidays.description: A bundle of talent in many ways, this singer-songwriter is on her way to success!

holidays.title: ElainaExe’s Birthday
holidays.description: This brilliant content creator has won over many fans by sharing her love of video games.

holidays.title: Ike Turner’s Birthday
holidays.description: The legendary American musician was at the center of much controversy during his career.

holidays.title: Johnny Damon’s Birthday
holidays.description: Damon's father served in the Army, and that means the family had to move often.

holidays.title: Kevin Jonas’s Birthday
holidays.description: Kevin is known for the Jonas Brothers, but he’s much more than that!

holidays.title: Kris Jenner’s Birthday
holidays.description: This business tycoon is the matriarch of the most powerful family in reality entertainment.

holidays.title: Lindsley Register’s Birthday
holidays.description: Lindsley Register is a brilliant artist who grows stronger every day. The world is hers!

holidays.title: Meredith Foster’s Birthday
holidays.description: This self-made star is turning heads and breaking boundaries with her success.

holidays.title: Naval Ravikant’s Birthday
holidays.description: Naval Ravikant is the most humble entrepreneur, sharing his vast knowledge with everyone!

holidays.title: Odell Beckham Jr.’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this athlete, greatness as a football player is in his D.N.A. Let’s celebrate him!

holidays.title: Roy Rogers’s Birthday
holidays.description: We know a good cowboy when we see one, and Rogers perfectly fits the description.

holidays.title: Ryan Adams’s Birthday
holidays.description: Ryan Adams is the epitome of grit and success despite unfavorable occurrences.

holidays.title: Samuel Page’s Birthday
holidays.description: It is possible to achieve your dreams, regardless of your education. Page has proven it.

holidays.title: Sophi Knight’s Birthday
holidays.description: She's a multitalented icon who doesn't let any negativity hold her down.

holidays.title: Virat Kohli’s Birthday
holidays.description: This star athlete has created a standard that’ll be difficult to measure up to.

holidays.title: Vivien Leigh’s Birthday
holidays.description: Vivian Leigh believed challenges we encounter are stepping stones to our success.
